xme_add_component (
    "sensorMonitor_adv_monitorMB"
    HEADERS
        "include/monitorMBComponentWrapper.h"
        "include/monitorMBComponent.h"
        "include/printSensorValueFunctionWrapper.h"
        "include/printSensorValueFunction.h"

        "src/monitorMBComponentWrapper.c"
        "src/monitorMBComponent.c"
        "src/printSensorValueFunctionWrapper.c"
        "src/printSensorValueFunction.c"
        "src/monitorMBManifest.c"
    DEPENDS
        xme_core_directory_attribute
    # PROTECTED REGION ID(SENSORMONITOR_ADV_MONITORMB_CMAKELISTS_TXT_XMEADDCOMPONENT) ENABLED START

    # PROTECTED REGION END
)
